arcade.empty: A seamless, tileable texture of neon colored lines on a black background, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
arcade.agent: A single pose of a pixelated, retro video game character for a 16x16 pixel grid cell. The character should be colorful and distinct.
arcade.goal: A seamless, tileable texture of a glowing neon portal, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
arcade.wall: A seamless, tileable texture of bright neon blocks as walls, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.

forest.empty: A seamless, tileable texture representing grass, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
forest.agent: A single pose of a forest ranger as a sprite for a 16x16 pixel grid cell. The ranger should be distinguishable and thematic.
forest.goal: A seamless, tileable texture of a treasure chest, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
forest.wall: A seamless, tileable texture of trees representing a wall, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.

space.empty: A seamless, tileable texture of a starry space background, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
space.agent: A single pose of an astronaut as a sprite for a 16x16 pixel grid cell. The astronaut should be easily identifiable.
space.goal: A seamless, tileable texture of a metallic spaceship door, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
space.wall: A seamless, tileable texture of metallic panels as walls, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.

medieval.empty: A seamless, tileable texture of cobblestone paths, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
medieval.agent: A single pose of a knight as a sprite for a 16x16 pixel grid cell. The knight should be clearly visible and distinct.
medieval.goal: A seamless, tileable texture of a castle door, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
medieval.wall: A seamless, tileable texture of stone walls, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.

underwater.empty: A seamless, tileable texture of sandy ocean floor, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
underwater.agent: A single pose of a diver as a sprite for a 16x16 pixel grid cell. The diver should be clear and thematic.
underwater.goal: A seamless, tileable texture of a treasure chest under water, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
underwater.wall: A seamless, tileable texture of coral as walls, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.

desert.empty: A seamless, tileable texture representing sandy desert ground, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
desert.agent: A single pose of a camel rider designed as a sprite for a 16x16 pixel grid cell. The rider should be visible and distinct.
desert.goal: A seamless, tileable texture representing an oasis with a small pond and palm trees, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
desert.wall: A seamless, tileable texture of a cactus representing a wall, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.

cyberpunk.empty: A seamless, tileable texture of neon-lit pavement, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
cyberpunk.agent: A single pose of a cyber-agent as a sprite for a 16x16 pixel grid cell. The agent should look futuristic and unique.
cyberpunk.goal: A seamless, tileable texture of a glowing cyber portal, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
cyberpunk.wall: A seamless, tileable texture of holographic barriers as walls, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.

winter.empty: A seamless, tileable texture of snowy ground, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
winter.agent: A single pose of a snowman as a sprite for a 16x16 pixel grid cell. The snowman should be cheerful and clear.
winter.goal: A seamless, tileable texture of a Christmas tree, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
winter.wall: A seamless, tileable texture of ice blocks as walls, designed for a low-resolution 16x16 pixel grid cell.
